name: BIRKANOID #LDJAM41
description:
My entry for Ludum Dare 41: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

It's Breakout/Arkanoid game mixed with a cardgame. Instead of a paddle, you have a deck of cards you can use to control the ball in a semi-turn based manner.

Your goal is to clear all mooks from the level. Beware of the red one though, he’s gonna eat your balls!

CONTROLS
  •  left | right - select card 
  • up - play card 
  • down - pause menu

Birkanoid on Ludum Dare

Please note: if you experience choppy sound or FPS bellow 60, please consider downloading the executable or the cartridge for the best experience.
